title: First post !!!
content: Welcome to the blog! Dont expect me to post here often.

title: uhhh, pico computer?
content: I just ran CP/M on my raspberry pi pico. It works, but its PAINFULLY SLOW. Still counts as a $2 computer though.

title: my favourite websites
content: here are my top 5 favourite websites: 1: neal fun - awesome games and stuff 2: classic.minecraft.net - classic minecraft in a browser 3: crazygames.com - free games in a browser 4: botland.com - electronics shop because yes 5: github.com - i mean, GITHUB
